TopicTitle: How long ya been here, hmm?

Articles.Content: Hello Forums! I first heard abour ksp back about maybe a year and a half ago when it was in version 0.13.3. Way back when before landing legs. You had to land on the moon with fins and radial decouplers. Which version did you guys start in?
I started with .16, back when Minmus looked round from map view.

Been playing the game about three weeks (90 hours, hey! Its summer vacation!), and been on the forum less days. First heard of Kerbal about a year ago, and wanted to buy it but my paypal account is all messed up. Just randomly noticed it was available on Steam and said hell yeah! Glad I got it Great game, with so much promise, and also a terrific community.

I discovered KSP when it was in .17, but bought 0.18.2.

I played .13 a lot though, I still remember landing on canards.

what version of the game did you download first?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/41466-what-version-of-the-game-did-you-download-first
I had the game for six weeks and have been on the forums for a month I heard about kerbal roughly 6 months ago
Been here since the height of 0.18.2.
Well since 15, heard about the game in 0.14. I joined the forums pretty much when I got the game, so about 14 months

Been here since the height of 0.18.2.

Same here.
About three and a half weeks now. I got it when Steam had it on sale a while back (though I missed the really low price).
0.17 was when I got it. In November I think. I joined the forums at a similar time.

I heard of this game from Kurtjmac, then I subscribed to him and he kept posting videos for this game, I fell in love with it then downloaded the demo, ( I think it's .13..? ) and never knew even how to orbit, but I kept trying, untill I got the game ( 0.17 ) and that was epic moment.. with planets and stuff.. the thing is I never reached anyplanet back in 0.17, but in 18 I reached duna and all that.. and here i'm.. pro at ksp ;D!
From some of 0.9's, surely from 0.10.
I started in one of the 0.8 versions, been playing on and off since then.
Played since 0.18 I think in my friends house... Bought the game in march something after the release of 0.19
Good old canard landings. They were the best. Who remembers sea skating? With parachutes

.15 was when I started.

I don't play as much now as I'd like. Kids and home renovations have seriously been cramping my KSP playtime. I hope and think I'll have a bit more time in the next couple of weeks so that I can squeeze in a couple of evenings a week again.

I started playing 'round .14 and didn't know what I was doing back then. I think I made one landing on mun and one accidental touchdown on minmus. I also got a couple friends of mine to buy it back then so that was fun, sharing our adventures.

I took a couple months off, though and only just started playing again in .20, mostly after .21 and I'm eagerly awaiting career mode.
0.11 here. Just before 0.12 came out and added the Mun, no less. Good times.

Technically you could say I started with 18.3 as that was the demo I played... However my first install of the full game was 0.19.1, a day after I installed (before I actually got to play) 0.20 came out soo I guess 0.20

So many newbies...

(I started with 0.8.4)

Joined in 13.3(demo) 14.3 (proper),in the demo the only place to go was the mun, out of the dozen landing attempts, only once out of sheer luck did I manage to land with wings on the mun, spent 5 seconds on the surface, then went" ... RUN WHILE YOU STILL CAN!":D.
Ive been here since 13.3. my friend has been here since 8.2.

I was lurking here Since the beginning of the forum, but over Year and half ago something forced me to log in .

Not really, but You had good approximation of what happen ;p.

Edited August 5, 2013 by karolus10
Me, well, I've been playing since 0.8.3 (at the very least), although I lurked for a while before joining the forums...
